body_html: Thanks a lot @sbyma and @yaroslavvb for your help. I'd really like to just get something working before I ditch inheriting from reader_base, but the build is proving difficult. I got it to compile with g++ but I had to copy header files into the user lib folder that tensorflow passes as the "include" folder since reader_base.h isn't copied there. It really doesn't seem like the best way to go so I hope to get some kind of response from a tensorflower.
body_text: Thanks a lot @sbyma and @yaroslavvb for your help. I'd really like to just get something working before I ditch inheriting from reader_base, but the build is proving difficult. body: Thanks a lot @sbyma and @yaroslavvb for your help. I'd really like to just get something working before I ditch inheriting from reader_base, but the build is proving difficult. I got it to compile with g++ but I had to copy header files into the user lib folder that tensorflow passes as the "include" folder since reader_base.h isn't copied there. It really doesn't seem like the best way to go so I hope to get some kind of response from a tensorflower.
